content: I've been trying to cut back on unnecessary expenses and make more intentional purchasing decisions, which has helped me feel more in control of my finances. By the way, I recently splurged on some high-end skincare products during the Nordstrom anniversary sale, which was a bit of an exception to my new budget-friendly habits. But I've been tracking my spending, and I realized that I tend to splurge on luxury items when I'm feeling stressed or celebrating a special occasion.
